name: tutorial-builder-server
description: Web app to build and follow JavaScript tutorials similar to those found on CodeCademy

scripts.refresh: mongod --port 4201 --dbpath ./db | mongo --port 4201 tutorial-builder --eval "db.dropDatabase()" | sleep 0.5s | mongoimport --port 4201 --db tutorial-builder --collection tutorials --jsonArray ./test_data/tutorials.json | mongoimport --port 4201 --db tutorial-builder --collection users --jsonArray ./test_data/users.json
